introduction: In this video, the presenter shares their recent computer setup upgrade, highlighting the components they chose and why. They discuss the importance of each component, including the CPU, GPU, motherboard, cooling system, and case. The video also covers the costs associated with each component and provides tips for choosing the right setup.

sections.title: Section 1: CPU
content: The presenter upgraded from a 7th generation Intel processor to a 13th generation processor.
The new processor has 24 cores, with 8 performance cores and 16 efficient cores.
It has a clock speed of 3 GHz in base mode and up to 58 GHz in turbo mode.
The presenter discusses the importance of CPU rendering and how the new processor's parameters affect working and rendering.

sections.title: Section 2: GPU
content: The presenter upgraded from an Nvidia GTX 1070 to an Nvidia RTX 4090.
The new GPU has more than 16,000 cores and a boost clock of 252 GHz.
It has 24 GB of VRAM.
The presenter discusses the importance of GPU for real-time rendering, video editing, and animations.

sections.title: Section 3: Motherboard
content: The presenter chose a new motherboard with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connectivity.
They kept the same SSD and haven't updated it yet.
The presenter discusses the importance of motherboard for system software and keeping the system software up to date.
They mention that they might upgrade the motherboard later on.

sections.title: Section 4: Cooling System
content: The presenter chose a Masterliquid Lite cooling system.
They discuss the importance of proper cooling for the computer.
The presenter mentions that they have had no issues with the new cooling system.
They mention that the new cooling system is quieter than the previous one.

sections.title: Section 5: Case
content: The presenter chose a be quiet pure base 500dx black case.
They discuss the importance of a solid case for portability.
The presenter mentions that they haven't had any issues with the new case.
They mention that the new case looks better on video than a simple black box.
